shortDescription: Reliable and comfortable sedan for city and highway.
description: The Toyota Yaris is a reliable and fuel-efficient sedan, perfect for navigating the city streets of Bergen. It offers a comfortable ride for up to 4 passengers and comes with modern amenities to make your journey enjoyable.
terms: Minimum rental age is 21. Valid driver's license required. Fuel policy: full to full.

shortDescription: Compact and fuel-efficient, ideal for urban driving.
description: The Toyota Aygo is the perfect companion for zipping around Stavanger. Its compact size makes parking a breeze, while its excellent fuel economy will save you money on your travels. Ideal for solo travelers or couples.
terms: Minimum rental age is 19. Perfect for young drivers. Low insurance excess.

shortDescription: Experience the future with this sleek electric vehicle.
description: Drive the future today with the Tesla Model Y. This all-electric sedan offers instant acceleration, a minimalist interior, and cutting-edge technology. Enjoy a silent and smooth ride while exploring Oslo and its surroundings.
terms: Charging costs are not included. Familiarity with electric vehicles is beneficial. Premium car terms apply.
